actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 93-871.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance with amendment, S. Rept. 93-735.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #76 (80-0).
House agreed to Senate amendments with an amendment.

official_title: An Act to increase the period during which benefits may be paid under title XVI of the Social Security Act on the basis of presumptive disability to certain individuals who received aid, on the basis of disability, for December 1973, under a State plan approved under title XIV or XVI of that act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases the period during which benefits may be paid under title XVI (Grants to States for Aid to the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) of the Social Security Act on the basis of presumptive disability to individuals who received aid, on the basis of disability, for December 1973, under a State plan approved under title XIV or XVI of that Act. Extends for 3 months the provision of Public Law 93-233 which permits States to participate in the extended unemployment compensation States to participate in the extended unemployment compensation States to participate in the extended unemployment compensation program if the rate of insured unemployment in the State is at least 4 percent, without regard to the requirement of permanent law that the insured unemployment rate must also have increased by 20 percent over the prior 2 years.

titles.title: A bill to increase the period during which benefits may be paid under title XVI of the Social Security Act on the basis of presumptive disability to certain individuals who received aid, on the basis of disability, for December 1973, under a State plan approved under title XIV or XVI of that act.

An Act to increase the period during which benefits may be paid under title XVI of the Social Security Act on the basis of presumptive disability to certain individuals who received aid, on the basis of disability, for December 1973, under a State plan approved under title XIV or XVI of that act, and for other purposes.
